title: Your account is in the process of transferring
body:
Hello.
I have a problem because I can not log in to the site.
And my client pops up. Your account is in the process of transferring
I contacted Polish support but they ignore me and they do not even read what I write.
Please help because I spent a lot of money and now I do not know what to do.


summ name : F4P pJect

replies.body:
I can not log on, and all the time when I log on to EUNE pops me this message. I do not know what to do but thank you at least you do not try to ignore me

I was on euw and on eune the same nicknames (F4P pJect) can through this.

Can you somehow verify my username: ---

Please help me because I really do not know what to do, already 4 days I try to somehow support the explain that I have this error and always get the same message

I've edited out your username and for privacy reasons.  In this case, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help recover your account.  If you already have a ticket open then our account specialists would be best fit to continue helping out.  Good luck!

I wrote to your support, because Polish support is constantly ignoring me
I hope that your support will really help me because I no longer hope and a lot of my time and money invested in this account.
Thank you again for your help I got some hope from you! thank you

Our ticket volume may be a little higher for response time, but I hate to hear that you're feeling ignored.  :(  I did look into your account, and it looks like your transfer was successful.  You should be able to login to EUW at this point.  Let me know if that helps.
I've described the whole situation in the above post, I do not know if it's up to you but hopefully I see you are willing to help me :(

I'm constantly ignored but I do not want you to think that the current email account that is assigned to it is --- - and the password itself consists of 11 Liter, just needs your help, because I have already written 10 tickets and always received ignorance did not even read My ticket ...

When I sign up for EUNE this pops up the message
I played eune 2 ranked games, and later I could not log in
You can even check F4P pJect-
If you help me, I will be very grateful to you!
